title: Taylor Swift's New Album Completes Transformation To Pop
teaser: The 24-year-old singer's latest album, "1989," continues the turn away from country music, where she started.
contentencoded:
Taylor Swift’s new album is out today. It’s called “1989,” after the year she was born, and it continues the turn away from country music, where she started. Cori Vallentine is a pop DJ in Nashville, and joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss Swift’s new sound.

Songs Heard In This Segment

  • Welcome To New York
  • Shake It Off
  • I Wish You Would
  • Wildest Dreams
  • Clean
  • Our Song (off her debut album in 2006)

[Youtube]

[Youtube]

Guest

  • Cori Vallentine, pop DJ in Nashville, Tenn. She tweets @CoriVallentine.
